In the latest episode of ["Breitband"](https://www.deutschlandfunkkultur.de/breitband-100.html) on Deutschlandfunk Kultur, there is an interview with [Dorothea Strecker](https://www.ibi.hu-berlin.de/de/institut/personen/strecker) from our research group at the Berlin School of Library and Information Science on shadow libraries [@belanger_pirate_2024]. The occasion for the interview was the lawsuit for damages against LibGen in the United States.

![](schattenbibliotheken.jpeg)

Here's the linkt to the Interview: ["LibGen: Shadow Libraries and eBook Piracy"](https://www.deutschlandfunkkultur.de/libgen-schattenbibliothek-ebook-piraterie-100.html) [@deutschlandfunkkulturde_libgen-urteil_2024].

Further information about our research group can be found on our [official website](http://hu.berlin/infomgnt).
